roleset.name: not be prompt
roleset.note: DAWDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dawdle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 53.1. (from dawdle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: actually nominal
example.text: But now, with large amounts being raised from investors, the government's dawdling on regulation and disclosure requirements has a more dangerous aspect.

example.name: verbal
example.text: John dawdled at school for hours, not wanting to go home to face a violent Mary.
example.arg: not wanting to go home to face a violent Mary
